description:
Sailor Moon R (R meaning Romance) is itself in two pieces.
The first part (Episode 1-13) features two aliens and an energy-dependent alien tree.
The second part (Episode 14-43) focuses around two things: http://anidb.net/ch7463 [Chibiusa], a little pink-haired http://anidb.net/ch7320 [Usagi] lookalike who literally dropped out of the sky, and a family of time-traveling enemies out to stop Chibiusa and alter the future to their end.
Source: absoluteanime.com/sailor_moon

REGULAR.description:
Two months have passed since the Sailor Guardians defeated the Dark Kingdom. Having lost all memory of being Sailor Moon, Usagi now lives her life as an ordinary girl.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Moon Fukkatsu! Nazo no Alien Shutsugen
Moon Returns: The Mysterious Aliens Appear
ムーン復活! 謎のエイリアン出現

REGULAR.description:
Sailor Moon finds herself facing new enemies from outer space, who call themselves Ail and An. The two aliens disguise themselves as humans to go after other human energy.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ai to Seigi Yue! Sailor Senshi Fukkatsu
For Love and for Justice: Sailor Guardians Once Again
愛と正義ゆえ! セーラー戦士再び

REGULAR.description:
Usagi, Mako, and Ami see a boy being attacked by one of Ail and An’s Cardian monsters. To Mako’s surprise, the boy turns out to be her childhood friend Shinozaki.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El caballero de la luz de luna
For Whom Is the White Rose? The Moonlight Knight Appears
Le chevalier du clair de lune
Shiroi Bara wa Dare ni? Tsukikage no Kishi Toujou
白いバラは誰に? 月影の騎士登場

REGULAR.description:
Usagi goes to a virtual reality arcade that has just opened up in the Juban District, where she unexpectedly runs into Mamoru, as well as Seijuro and Natsumi.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El teatro de la realidad virtual
Usagi no Kiki! Tiara Sadou Sezu
Usagi`s Crisis: The Tiara Stops Working
うさぎの危機! ティアラ作動せず

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and her friends are enjoying the cherry blossoms, which are in full bloom, when the Cardian Leshy attacks them. During the fight, the Sailor Guardians are caught, and Sailor Moon loses her power to transform.
Source: hulu

titles.title: 新しき変身! うさぎパワーアップ

REGULAR.description:
Minako befriends a little girl named Mie who is a huge fan of Sailor Moon. Meanwhile, Ail and An send a Cardian to steal energy from young children.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Il nuovo potere di Sailor Venus
The Targeted Kindergarteners: Venus to the Rescue
Происшествие в детском саду. Венера получает новую силу
狙われた園児! ヴィーナス大活躍

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and Mamoru find themselves looking after a baby boy while his mother is recovering from having her energy stolen by a Cardian.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Armando y Bunny se convierten en canguros
Mamoru to Usagi no Babysitter Soudou
衛とうさぎのベビーシッター騒動

REGULAR.description:
A school festival is going to be held at T.A. Girls’ Academy, which Rei attends. When Usagi and Ami go to check up on her, they find Rei busy overseeing the setup and events.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Bunkasai wa Watashi no Tame!? Rei Joou Nesshou
La melodía de RayIl debutto di Rea
The School Festival Is for Me?! Queen Rei`s Song
文化祭は私のため!? レイ女王熱唱

REGULAR.description:
Ami and Makoto are trying to figure out who exactly the Moonlight Knight is. Suspecting that Seijuro and the Moonlight Knight may be the same person, Makoto volunteers to investigate by getting closer to Seijuro.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Is Seijuro the Moonlight Knight? Mako on Fire
Le coup de cœur de Marcy
月影は星十郎? 燃えるまこちゃん

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and the girls get into an argument over who gets to play Snow White in the upcoming play with Mamoru. After drawing straws, Natsumi gets the part, much to Usagi`s frustration.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Mamoru no Kiss Ubae! Ann no Shirayukihime Sakusen
Steal a Kiss from Mamoru: An`s Project Snow White
衛のキス奪え! アンの白雪姫作戦

REGULAR.description:
Usagi and Natsumi both get detention after angering Ms. Haruna during class. The two start working on their assignment when a Cardian suddenly shows up.
Source: hulu

titles.title: After-School Trouble: Usagi Is a Target
放課後にご用心! 狙われたうさぎ

REGULAR.description:
Ail and An learn that the Makai Tree is beginning to die from lack of energy. Meanwhile, Usagi and her friends visit Seijuro and Natsumi`s apartment after hearing that Natsumi is not feeling well.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Disconnecting Love: The Raging Makai Tree
Surechigau Ai no Kokoro! Ikari no Makaiju
すれちがう愛の心! 怒りの魔界樹

REGULAR.description:
While visiting Seijuro and Natsumi`s apartment, Usagi and Mamoru come under attack by the Makai Tree.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Mezameru Shinjitsu no Ai! Makaiju no Himitsu
True Love Awakens: The Makai Tree`s Secret
めざめる真実の愛! 魔界樹の秘密

REGULAR.description:
A mysterious girl suddenly falls down from the sky, much to Usagi and Mamoru`s surprise. Calling herself "Usagi," the girl demands Usagi to tell her where the Silver Crystal is.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Angel or Devil? The Mysterious Girl from the Sky
Tenshi? Akuma? Sora kara Kita Nazo no Shoujo
天使? 悪魔? 空から来た謎の少女

REGULAR.description:
Usagi wakes up one morning to find that Chibi-Usa has gone missing. Meeting up with Mamoru, the two search the neighborhood for Chibi-Usa, eventually finding her sitting alone at the park.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Usagi Dai Shock! Mamoru no Zekkou Sengen
Usagi Devastated: Mamoru Declares a Break-Up
うさぎ大ショック! 衛の絶交宣言

REGULAR.description:
Ami is offered a chance to study abroad in Germany, which would bring her one step closer to her dream of becoming a doctor. Knowing how important this is to her, Usagi and the others urge Ami to accept the offer.
Source: hulu

titles.title: 戦士の友情! さよなら亜美ちゃん

REGULAR.description:
Rei`s grandfather is upset over the fact that Hikawa Shrine has had fewer female visitors lately. He then decides to retire as head priest to start a new business, which would allow him to be around young women, much to Rei`s annoyance.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Fuerza y belleza para las chicas
Onna wa Tsuyoku Utsukushiku! Rei no Shin Hissatsu Waza
Women Must Be Strong and Beautiful: Rei`s New Special Technique
女は強く美しく! レイの新必殺技

REGULAR.description:
Rubeus sends down Petz and her Droid to search and capture Chibi-Usa. Meanwhile, Chibi-Usa is calling someone on her Luna P ball telling her she wants to go home.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ginzuishou o Motomete! Chibiusa no Himitsu
In Search of the Silver Crystal: Chibi-Usa`s Secret
銀水晶を求めて! ちびうさの秘密

REGULAR.description:
Minako and Makoto clash over their opposing views on love. Wanting to break the tension, Usagi takes the girls to check out a new accessory shop, unaware that Petz and Calaveras run the place.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Dispute over Love: Minako and Makoto`s Conflict
Koi no Ronsou! Minako to Makoto ga Tairitsu
恋の論争! 美奈子とまことが対立

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa`s class is having a parent-child curry party this weekend. After hearing that neither Kenji nor Ikuko can attend due to prior commitments, Usagi decides to go in their place.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Usagi no Oyagokoro!? Curry na Sankaku Kankei
Usagi`s Parental Love: The Curry Romance Triangle
うさぎの親心? カレーな三角関係

REGULAR.description:
The girls enjoy some vacation time on an island. But during lunch Chibi-Usa and Rei get into a small fight, causing an angry Chibi-Usa to go out to the sea alone.
Source: hulu

titles.title: The Beach, the Island and a Vacation: The Guardians` Break
Umi yo Shima yo Vacance yo! Senshi no Kyuusoku
海よ島よバカンスよ! 戦士の休息

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa leaves the house after being scolded by Usagi. Roaming the streets alone, Chibi-Usa is overcome with sadness and begins to cry, which draws the attention of Rubeus and the Four Spectre Sisters.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Chibi Usa o Mamore! 10 Senshi no Dai Gekisen
Protect Chibi-Usa: Clash of the Ten Warriors
ちびうさを守れ! 10戦士の大激戦

REGULAR.description:
Mamoru has a dream in which a mysterious voice warns him that being with Usagi will bring her great misfortune. Meanwhile, Sailor Moon is put into a deep coma after being attacked by a Droid.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Awaken the Sleeping Beauty: Mamoru`s Distress
Mezameyo Nemureru Bishoujo! Mamoru no Kunou
目覚めよ眠れる美少女! 衛の苦悩

REGULAR.description:
Wiseman predicts that Chibi-Usa will appear at Hikawa Shrine. Learning of this, Rubeus orders Koan to go down there and eliminate their target.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ai no Honoo no Taiketsu! Mars VS Kooan
Battle of the Flames of Love! Mars vs. Koan
愛の炎の対決! マーズVSコーアン

REGULAR.description:
Ami enters the World Chess Tournament, which is being held at the newly constructed Chess Tower. But Bertheir is also there, forcing Ami to transform and reveal her identity as a Sailor Guardian to the enemy.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Yuujou no Tame! Ami to Berthier Gekitotsu
友情のため! 亜美とベルチェ激突

REGULAR.description:
Having run out of patience over the Spectre Sisters` continual failures, Rubeus gives Petz and Calaveras one last chance to eliminate Rabbit and the Sailor Guardians once and for all.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El dolor de las cuatro hermanas
Hijou no Rubeus! Kanashimi no Yon Shimai
Rubeus the Heartless: The Tragic Sisters
非情のルベウス! 哀しみの四姉妹

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa finally learns that Usagi is Sailor Moon. Eager to return to the future, she steals Usagi`s Silver Crystal and flees, only to be ambushed by Rubeus.
Source: hulu

titles.title: A UFO Appears: The Sailor Guardians Abducted
UFO出現! さらわれたS戦士達

REGULAR.description:
Rubeus succeeds in taking four of the five Sailor Guardians prisoner. He then demands that Sailor Moon bring Chibi-Usa and the Silver Crystal to him in exchange for the girls` lives.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Defeat Rubeus: The Battle in Space
Rubeus o Taose! Uchuukuukan no Kessen
Малышка, ты молодец! Битва в космосе
ルベウスを倒せ! 宇宙空間の決戦

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa falls into a coma after coming down with a mysterious fever. Usagi and the others are at a loss for what to do, when a Sailor Guardian calling herself Sailor Pluto suddenly appears before them.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Nazo no Shin Senshi Sailor Pluto Toujou
The Mysterious New Guardian: Sailor Pluto Appears
謎の新戦士セーラープルート登場

REGULAR.description:
The Black Moon clan sends down its next operative, Esmeraude, to open the Dark Gate in 20th century Tokyo.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ankoku no Maryoku! Esmeraude no Shinryaku
暗黒の魔力! エスメロードの侵略

REGULAR.description:
Usagi is still depressed over Mamoru calling off their relationship. Ami and Mako try to cheer her up by taking Usagi to a promise ring workshop.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Omoi wa Onaji! Usagi to Mamoru no Ai Futatabi
Shared Feelings: Usagi and Mamoru in Love Once Again
想いは同じ! うさぎと衛の愛再び

REGULAR.description:
A strange new flu is causing everyone in town to get sick, including the Sailor Guardians. Minako is the only one still healthy and takes it upon herself to look after her sick friends.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Venus Minako no Nurse Dai Soudou
ヴィーナス美奈子のナース大騒動

REGULAR.description:
Artemis is out to prove he is capable after being teased by Luna. While on patrol, he encounters a suspicious-looking man who is gathering stray animals.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Artemis no Bouken! Ma no Doubutsu Oukoku
Artemis`s Adventure: The Monster Animal Kingdom
アルテミスの冒険! 魔の動物王国

REGULAR.description:
The school test results are posted, and Ami is once again at the top of her class. But she soon finds herself becoming isolated after some of her schoolmates spread false rumors that she cheated on the test.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Kyoufu no Gen`ei! Hitoribocchi no Ami
The Terrifying Illusion: Ami All Alone
恐怖の幻影! ひとりぼっちの亜美

REGULAR.description:
After being out sick a couple of days, Chibi-Usa returns to school eager to see her friends. But to her surprise, her friends and teachers begin attacking her.
Source: hulu

titles.title: The Dark Gate Is Completed? The Targeted Elementary School
暗黒ゲート完成? 狙われた小学校

REGULAR.description:
Chibi-Usa finally decides to return to the future to save her mother. With support from the Sailor Guardians and Tuxedo Mask, she overcomes her fears and opens the Door of Space and Time.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Journey to the Future: Battle in the Space-Time Corridor
Mirai e no Tabidachi! Jikuu Kairou no Tatakai
未来への旅立ち! 時空回廊の戦い

REGULAR.description:
Arriving in the future, the Sailor Guardians stand in shock as they see the ruins of what used to be Crystal Tokyo. Chibi-Usa goes missing afterwards, and as they search for her, the group encounters a man who looks exactly like Tuxedo Mask.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Shougeki no Mirai! Dimando no Kuroki Yabou
The Shocking Future: Demande`s Dark Ambition
衝撃の未来! デマンドの黒き野望

REGULAR.description:
Tuxedo Mask rescues Sailor Moon from Black Moon’s castle. But before they can all celebrate, a giant dragon suddenly appears to destroy the Crystal Palace.
Source: hulu

titles.title: El secreto de la Primera Dama
Le secret de la petite demoiselle
ワイズマンの魔の手! ちびうさ消滅

REGULAR.description:
Wiseman brainwashes Chibi-Usa and turns her into the Dark Queen known as Black Lady. Realizing that something has happened to Chibi-Usa, the Sailor Guardians return to present-day Earth to find her.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ankoku no Joou Black Lady no Tanjou
El nacimiento de la Dama Negra
The Dark Queen: Birth of Black Lady
暗黒の女王ブラックレディの誕生

REGULAR.description:
Saphir learns of Wiseman’s true intentions and tries to warn his brother, only to be attacked by Wiseman himself. Barely managing to escape, Saphir is surprised when he is saved by Petz and her sisters.
Source: hulu

titles.title: サフィール絶命! ワイズマンの罠

REGULAR.description:
The sudden appearance of the giant Malefic Black Crystal Tower is wreaking havoc across the world. Sailor Moon and the Guardians decide to enter the tower to put an end to this once and for all.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Ai to Mirai o Shinjite! Usagi no Kesshin
Believing in Love and the Future: Usagi`s Decision
愛と未来を信じて! うさぎの決心

REGULAR.description:
The Dark Gate opens, and Dark Energy spreads everywhere. To stop this, the Sailor Guardians must defeat Black Lady.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Hikari to Yami no Saishuu Kessen! Mirai e Chikau Ai
The Final Battle Between Light and Dark: Pledge of Love for the Future
光と闇の最終決戦! 未来へ誓う愛

REGULAR.description:
Peace has returned, and the Sailor Guardians take a moment to look back at their past battles as they prepare for their next challenge.
Source: hulu

titles.title: Entschluss von Usagi und Co! – Ouvertüre zu einem neuen Kampf
Usagi and the Girls` Resolve: Prelude to a New Battle
Usagi-tachi no Ketsui! Shin Shiki Tatakai no Jokyoku
うさぎ達の決意! 新しき戦いの序曲

6006.name: Tokyo is the centre of the universe

titles.title: เซเลอร์มูน R
美少女戦士セーラームーン R
